name: Valentina
title: the Passionate
ongoing_effect: Your Latin moves gain +1 bonus score

name: Lord Ashworth
title: the Refined
ongoing_effect: Your Ballroom moves gain +1 bonus score
flavor_quote: Elegance is not about being noticed. It's about being remembered.

name: Ekaterina
title: the Perfectionist
ongoing_effect: Your Classical moves gain +1 bonus score
flavor_quote: Technique is the foundation. Artistry is the ceiling.

name: Marcus "Showtime" Bell
title: the Showstopper
ongoing_effect: Your Jazz moves gain +1 bonus score
flavor_quote: If they're not watching you you're doing it wrong.

name: DJ K-Pulse
title: the Beat Master
ongoing_effect: Your Street moves gain +1 bonus score
flavor_quote: Feel the beat. Be the beat.

name: The Whirlwind
title: Master of Rotation
flavor_quote: Stillness is death. Motion is life.

name: Icarus
title: Sky Dancer
ongoing_effect: All Jump moves gain +1 bonus score

name: The Sculptor
title: Form and Flow
flavor_quote: Movement is clay. The body is the artist.

name: The Minimalist
title: Less is More
requirement: Execute 8 moves all cost 3 or less
ongoing_effect: At end of each round if you played no cost 4+ moves draw 1 card
flavor_quote: Complexity is easy. Simplicity is hard.

name: The Polyglot
title: Master of All
requirement: Execute at least 1 move from each of the 5 styles in one round (+ 3 any)
ongoing_effect: Multi-style cards count as ALL their listed styles (not just one)
flavor_quote: Why speak one language when you can speak five?

name: The Machine
title: Perfect Execution
requirement: Execute 8 moves successfully with no failed executions
ongoing_effect: If you successfully execute all 8 moves in a round +3 points
flavor_quote: Never stop. Never stumble. Never fail.

name: The Showstopper
title: Crowd Favorite
requirement: Win crowd favor (outright not style-matched) 4 times in one round
ongoing_effect: When you win crowd favor +1 bonus point (in addition to normal rewards)
flavor_quote: They came to see a star. Give them one.
